description:
I was recently scammed through a fake website pretending to be a Solana token creation platform called solmemecoins.org. The site looked legitimate and asked me to connect my Phantom wallet and pay to create a token. I paid the requested amount in SOL, and the transaction shows as “Success” on Solscan.After I paid, the site falsely claimed that “no payments were found” and then a supposed “support agent” told me to send another payment equal to the first one for verification. That’s when I realized it was a scam.

I was recently scammed through a fake website pretending to be a Solana token creation platform called solmemecoins.org. The site looked legitimate and asked me to connect my Phantom wallet and pay to create a token. I paid the requested amount in SOL, and the transaction shows as “Success” on Solscan.

After I paid, the site falsely claimed that “no payments were found” and then a supposed “support agent” told me to send another payment equal to the first one for verification. That’s when I realized it was a scam.

Amount lost

The following sites have been reported by users as potentially fraudulent. These links are provided for reference and investigative purposes only, not as endorsements.

https://solmemecoins.org/

https://solmemecoins.org/
